contentencoded: Home Depot is out today with strong earnings. American sales are up 11 percent from last year. Marketplace's Queena Kim joins Morning Report host Mark Garrison to discuss what the numbers say about the larger housing market,
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, August 20, 2013
teaser: Home Depot is out today with strong earnings. American sales are up 11 percent from last year.
description: Home Depot is out today with strong earnings. American sales are up 11 percent from last year.
